author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, Paul Foster of Lockheed Martin and Gita Sukthankar of UCF discuss in-progress work of an Unreal Engine plugin that provides an interactive chat that works alongside the Behavior Tree editor in the Unreal Editor. 

Military doctrine refers to the guidelines that govern how military forces participate in various types of operations, from campaigns and battles to engagements. By leveraging large language models (LLMs), developers can create a model that understands these guidelines and assists developers in creating behavior trees or state trees that accurately capture military doctrine within the Unreal Engine Game AI framework, including real-world scenarios for training.

By building on research from the University of Central Florida and utilizing behavior tree examples from the robotics industry, we can make the authoring of behavior trees for individual agents and multi-agent systems more efficient and realistic, and less labor-i
title: Capturing Military Doctrine in Behavior Trees Using LLMs | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, we showcase the latest MetaHuman Animator updates. Throughout the talk, presenters go under the hood and outline the technology powering MetaHuman Animator. 

Watch to learn about the future of digital human animation and explore what’s next for in-game and high-quality cinematic experiences.

Find out more about MetaHuman Animator here: dev.epicgames.com/documentation/metahuman/metahuman-animator

#MetaHumanAnimator, #DigitalHumans, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Real-Time Workflows with MetaHuman Animator | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this panel session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, three Industry leaders join Epic Games in a discussion of how they utilize Epic Games' tools to redefine the way marketing content is created. 

This panel spans a wide range of advertising content from agency distributed workflows including animated and live content, and virtual production. 

Topics include a definition of key value propositions for framing efforts to your leadership; grounding on where different Epic tools fit into agency workflows, and some easy wins for adoption; fundamental best practices; and pitfalls to avoid.

To find out more about Unreal Engine, check out our website: www.unrealengine.com

#EpicGames, #Marketing, #Animation, #LiveContent, #VirtualProduction, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Epic Marketing Workflows | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
